DOCNAME: CASE OF GADZHIKHANOV AND SAUKOV v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: No violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Enforcement proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time);No violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Elisabeth Steiner;Julia Laffranque;Khanlar Hajiyev;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen
TEXT: CARDINAL . The first applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE . The second applicant was born inCARDINAL and lives in GPE , PERSON .

CARDINAL . By a judgment of DATE the ORG of GPE granted in part the applicant ’s claim against the town administration , recognized that the ORG had unlawfully confiscated the house owned by his father and awarded him compensation in the amount of MONEY ( RUB ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld that judgment on appeal , and on DATE the trial court forwarded the applicant a writ of execution . The trial court specified in the writ of execution that the debtor was ORG at the town administration .
CARDINAL . The applicant did not take any further steps to recover the judicial award . As a result , the judgment of DATE remains unenforced .

CARDINAL . By a judgment of DATE ORG convicted the applicant of various crimes and sentenced him to imprisonment . That judgment was quashed by way of supervisory review on DATE by the Presidium of ORG ( “ the ORG ” ) . Having found that the lower courts had incorrectly assessed evidence in the case , the ORG decided to discontinue the criminal proceedings against the applicant .

CARDINAL . The applicant sued the ORG for damages . By a judgment of DATE the NORP Town Court of LOC awarded the applicant compensation for unlawful detention in the amount of RUB CARDINAL . On DATE the trial court issued a writ of execution and sent it to the applicant . The above judgment was upheld on appeal by ORG on DATE . By a letter of DATE ORG informed the applicant of the domestic procedure to follow in order to recover the judicial award in his favour .
CARDINAL . NORP Despite that information the applicant did not take any further steps to recover the judicial award . As a result , the judgment of DATE remains unenforced .

CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL § CARDINAL of LAW of GPE provides that enforcement of judicial decisions recovering funds from the budgetary system of GPE is held on the basis of the enforcement documents ( writ of execution , court order ) .

CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL § CARDINAL of the same LAW provides that along with the writ of execution the creditor or the court acting on his or her behalf should submit a duly certified copy of the judicial decision and a written request containing the creditor ’s bank account details .
